org.pvg.plasmagraph.utils.tools.outlierscan

Interface OutlierDistance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CartesianDistance, MahalanobisDistance

    public interface OutlierDistance

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double distance(java.util.ArrayList<org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.DoublePoint> outlier_array)
      Calculate the maximum outlier distance of a data set.
      java.lang.String getDistanceType()
      Helper method.

    • Method Detail

      • distance

        double distance(java.util.ArrayList<org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.DoublePoint> outlier_array)
        Calculate the maximum outlier distance of a data set.
        Parameters:
        outlier_array - An array of DoublePoints that the user has requested to be checked for outliers.
        Returns:
        A double containing the approximate cartesian distance between two points. A point within this distance of the primary cluster is considered a regular point; elsewise, it is an outlier.

      • getDistanceType

        java.lang.String getDistanceType()
        Helper method. Provides the string representation of the type of distance being calculated.
